mapper.select: select b.board_id, b.title, m.name, b.views, b.reg_date from noticeboard b left join member m on b.member_id=m.member_id order by b.board_id desc
select b.board_id, b.title, b.content, b.views, b.reg_date, m.name, b.member_id from noticeboard b left join member m on b.member_id = m.member_id where b.board_id = #{board_id}
mapper.insert: insert into noticeboard(member_id, title, content, views, reg_date) values(#{member_id},#{title},#{content},0,NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE noticeboard SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE board_id = #{board_id}
